text: Home Retail Group plc was one of the UK's leading home and general merchandise retailers. It is the parent company of Argos and Habitat. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index. Home Retail Group owns a number of well-known brands, including Alba, Bush, Chad Valley, Challenger, Cherokee, Cooksworks, Habitat, Heart of House, Hygena, Schreiber, and Sovereign. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2006 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2016 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:Defunct companies of the United Kingdom Category:Retail markets Category:Companies listed on the London Stock Exchange Category:Milton Keynes
title: Home Retail Group
